A `itemStyle` option should be added to legend option, similar to [series.itemStyle](https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-bar.itemStyle). It should take `borderColor`, `borderWidth`, `borderType` from series by default, and can be overwritten by `legend.itemStyle`.

If the tooltip is `trigger: axis` and the axis is Y, only current y value can be obtained in the parameter of the tooltip.formatter.
If the x value is required, maybe change it to this one <http://jsfiddle.net/kucpfb8x/1/>.

1. 鼠标缩放不是 toolbox 里控制里，是 dataZoom 组件控制的，如果加了 dataZoom 组件且 type 是 'inside' 则会使用鼠标或者双指缩放

2. dataZoom 的目的是为了过滤数据而不是裁剪视图范围，所以目前这个表现是符合预期的

1. 我是想默认激活鼠标选框缩放，而不是鼠标中键滚动缩放，这个是默认的

2. 有没有办法实现 裁剪视图范围，给个思路也行
非常感谢

even `"series": {"name": "insufficient_data", "type": "bar", data:[[0,0]]}` doesn't work! which is now causing real headache...

I'm working on a fix, I will try a pull request.

EDIT:  
I got the fix working : https://github.com/mathiasleroy/incubator-echarts/commit/01fcf44d17ee5b8e5524d2136a3f23704b6460f3
目前做了一个缓解之计：监听页面的mousemove事件，每次记录事件触发时间戳，当实时数据到达时计算当前时刻与之前记录的时间戳二者时间差，若小于100ms则不更新图表，否则才更新。但这也只是缓解之计。期望更好的方法解决之。

@arashdalir : Regarding Event triggers: There is a feature planned to expose grid events as well, see e.g. issue #9281.
@Ovilia - is there already a release planned containing this feature?

@100pah 你好，最新版本4.2.0-rc.2还没有支持 radar.axisLabel.show
Same problem. Any solutions ?

@shentao1 
I checked the code, label is connected with symbol. If `showSymbol = false`, it won't draw label.
And if you want to show label without symbol, you need to set `symbol: 'none'` instead of `showSymbol: false`.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20534564/48199693-e36df080-e397-11e8-9040-c36e8d24235a.png)
However, when I set `symbol: 'none'`, it still doesn't draw label. 
I checked the code again, and found a function `symbolNeedsDraw`.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20534564/48199840-54150d00-e398-11e8-9863-4dc303abb7c3.png)
so when  `symbol: 'none'` , this function will return false, it won't draw symbol, neither label.
I think maybe the developer doesn't want to show label without symbol, so I'm not sure whether it is a bug or not.
And I tested, if the condition `data.getItemVisual(idx, 'symbol') !== 'none'` is  removed, we can draw the line chart like this.  
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20534564/48199869-68590a00-e398-11e8-9282-35278709fde8.png)
Hope it helps.
`filtermode: 'none'` resolves the problem.
希望能尽快修复，或者可以提供下解决思路
这个问题在最新的版本中还是存在
希望能尽快解决，有没有临时的解决方案

I've checked the linked repository and the error doesn't seem to exist. Tested in:
* Google Chrome 70.0.3538.77
* Firefox Quantum, Mozilla v63.0.1 - Snap
* Opera v56.0.3051.99 - Snap
This seems to be a feature request and not a bug. I would recommend relabeling it.

It makes sense to be able to have a label without a symbol, so it's definitely a bug, but this would be a breaking change, is there a long-term plan? Maybe this could be tagged to be implemented for a future major release with a proper CHANGELOG entry.
This is a bug with the 'svg' feature, so I reopened it for future reference.

这个图跟可视化语法的关系是？

echarts 目前的实现就是在往可视化语法和规则靠拢

@100pah 

> 当然版本中，关系图只能用 viusualMap 映射颜色。
> 这有望在下版本中得到改善。参见 #9171。

我现在在做知识图谱的项目，这个可以同时选择「颜色」和「大小」动态映射到不同的node属性上是非常必须的功能。可能我等不到下版本发布，现在可以通过使用dev版本之类的来使用这个新功能吗？

在截图图表中表现出两个能力：    
-  髙维矩阵。突破原有单图表固有数据结构的束缚，可以更大程度的释放人作为可视化主体的能动性和灵活性；  
-  对于矩阵块中的“标记”，是一种相对图表来说更细粒度的拆解，可以有更多的视觉表达，比如大小、颜色等，可以更进一步的辅助人进行探索分析。    

我觉得，可视化就是应该往更有助于人理解和分析的方向发展和演变。也一直看好echarts，希望能够echarts在可视化表达上进行突破，同时带动可视化相关产业同步升级。    

  附一张Tableau图表分析：    

![28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8817369/48241410-c83fc700-e411-11e8-8ac0-046f20c188ac.png)
我们不再继续提供地图数据，你可以从 https://github.com/echarts-maps/echarts-china-cities-js 等渠道获取需要的地图数据
